mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of the state of Florida / compiled in the Bureau of Topogl. Engrs., from the most recent authorities, and prepared by order the Honorable Jeff. Davis, Secretary of War, in conformity with a resolution of the Senate of the 11th Feby. 1856, calling for "a general map of the peninsula of Florida, illustrative of the recent surveys for a canal, executed by virtue of the appropriations made for that purpose," 1856
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: C.B. Graham's Lith.
Davis, Jefferson, 1808-1889
United States. Topographical Bureau.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Includes List of authorities and notes; does not include additional statements of responsibilty which appear on some versions of the map.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Florida--Maps.
